languages.text: "Что? Право, {name}, вы говорите так, словно наслушались речей этих несчастных деревенщин... я не прошу платить мне подати людьми. Я снижаю нагрузку с поселений, которые пострадали из-за неудачных экспериментов с обогащенным питанием, и собираю для исследования наиболее пострадавших подданных, уже непригодных для работ. Кое-кто из моего круга общения называет такую заботу о простолюдинах проявлением слабости. Которая, возможно, и спровоцировала бунты среди осмелевшей черни".

traits.locale_text: "Что? Право, {name}, вы говорите так, словно наслушались речей этих несчастных бунтовщиков... я не прошу платить мне подати людьми. Я снижаю нагрузку с поселений, которые пострадали из-за неудачного распыления токсинов, и собираю для исследования наиболее пострадавших подданных, уже непригодных для работ. Кое-кто из моего круга общения называет такую заботу о смердах проявлением слабости. Которая, возможно, и спровоцировала бунты среди осмелевшей черни".

languages.text: "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."
languages.original_text: "Что? Право, {name}, вы говорите так, словно наслушались речей этих несчастных деревенщин... я не прошу платить мне подати людьми. Я снижаю нагрузку с поселений, которые пострадали из-за неудачных экспериментов с обогащенным питанием, и собираю для исследования наиболее пострадавших подданных, уже непригодных для работ. Кое-кто из моего круга общения называет такую заботу о простолюдинах проявлением слабости. Которая, возможно, и спровоцировала бунты среди осмелевшей черни".

I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

languages.text: “什么？说真的，{name}，您的语气听起来，就仿佛您真的相信那些可恶的农奴的谣言一样……我从来没让任何人用身体来支付什一税。由于浓缩食物的相关实验并不成功，我正在努力减轻那些受影响的定居点的负担，同时把那些受影响最严重的那些人，那些丧失了工作能力的人聚在一起，进行进一步研究。在我的圈子里，有一部分人可能会把对底层民众的关心称之为弱点，这个弱点可能会导致有恃无恐的乌合之众爆发叛乱。”
languages.original_text: "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

traits.locale_text: “什么？说真的，{name}，您的语气听起来，就仿佛您真的相信那些可恶的农民的谣言一样……我从来没让任何人用身体来支付什一税。由于浓缩食物的相关实验并不成功，我正在努力减轻那些受影响的定居点的负担，同时把那些受影响最严重的那些人，那些丧失了工作能力的人聚在一起，进行进一步研究。在我的圈子里，有一部分人可能会把对底层民众的关心称之为弱点，这个弱点可能会导致有恃无恐的乌合之众爆发叛乱。”

languages.text: «¿Qué? En serio, {name}, habla como si de verdad creyera las palabras del populacho... No he pedido ningún diezmo en cuerpos humanos. Lo que estoy haciendo es reducir la carga de los asentamientos que han sufrido a causa de los experimentos fallidos con comida enriquecida y hacerme cargo de los sujetos más afectados, que quedan incapacitados para trabajar, para seguir estudiando los efectos. Entre mis allegados hay quien considera esta preocupación por las clases bajas una debilidad, y es posible que haya sido la causa de la rebelión entre una chusma embravecida».
languages.original_text: "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué? En serio, {name}, habla como si de verdad creyera las palabras del populacho... No he pedido ningún diezmo en cuerpos humanos. Lo que estoy haciendo es reducir la carga de los asentamientos que han sufrido a causa de los experimentos fallidos con comida enriquecida y hacerme cargo de los sujetos más afectados, que quedan incapacitados para trabajar, para seguir estudiando los efectos. Entre mis allegados hay quien considera esta preocupación por las clases bajas una debilidad, y es posible que haya sido la causa de la rebelión entre una chusma embravecida».

languages.text: 「何ですって？まさか、{name}様が、あのようなみすぼらしい農民たちの世迷い言を本当に信じているなどと仰るなんて…税を身体で払えと命じたことなどありません。食料の改良実験に失敗した開拓地は税負担を減らしていますし、最も大きな被害を被った臣民を集めて仕事ができない分、さらなる研究をさせているのです。下層階級へのこうした気遣いを弱さと称する者も、中にはいます。弱さが暴徒をつけあがらせ、反乱を誘発したかもしれない、と」
languages.original_text: "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

traits.locale_text: 「何ですって？まさか、{name}様が、あのようなみすぼらしい農民たちの世迷い言を本当に信じているなどと仰るなんて…税を身体で払えと命じたことなどありません。食料の改良実験に失敗した開拓地は税負担を減らしていますし、最も大きな被害を被った臣民を集めて仕事ができない分、さらなる研究をさせているのです。下層階級へのこうした気遣いを弱さと称する者も、中にはいます。弱さが暴徒をつけあがらせ、反乱を誘発したかもしれない、と」

languages.text: "Was? Wirklich, {name}, es klingt, als würdet Ihr die Behauptungen dieser elenden Bauern tatsächlich glauben ... Ich verlange von niemandem den Zehnt in Menschen. Ich lindere lediglich die Bürde von Ansiedlungen, die unter erfolglosen Experimenten mit Nahrungsergänzungsmitteln leiden, indem ich ihnen zu weiteren Studien die am schlimmsten betroffenen Subjekte abnehme, die ohnehin nicht mehr arbeitsfähig sind. Manche aus meinen Kreisen würden derlei Mitgefühl für die Unterklasse eine Schwäche nennen. Eine Schwäche, die bei dem so ermutigten Gesindel möglicherweise zum Aufstand geführt hat."
languages.original_text: "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

traits.locale_text: "Was?" Wirklich, {name}, es klingt, als würdet Ihr die Behauptungen dieser elenden Bauern tatsächlich glauben ... Ich verlange von niemandem den Zehnt in Menschen. Ich lindere lediglich die Bürde von Ansiedlungen, die unter erfolglosen Experimenten mit Nahrungsergänzungsmitteln leiden, indem ich ihnen zu weiteren Studien die am schlimmsten betroffenen Subjekte abnehme, die ohnehin nicht mehr arbeitsfähig sind. Manche aus meinen Kreisen würden derlei Mitgefühl für die Unterklasse eine Schwäche nennen. Eine Schwäche, die bei dem so ermutigten Gesindel möglicherweise zum Aufstand geführt hat."

languages.text: « Comment ? Allons, {name}, ne me dites pas que vous croyez les affabulations de ces misérables paysans... Je ne demande à personne de payer les taxes en êtres humains, je me contente d'alléger le fardeau des villages qui ont pâti de l'échec des expériences sur la nourriture enrichie. En clair, je rassemble les sujets les plus touchés, ceux qui ne sont plus capables de travailler, pour les étudier davantage. Certains dans mon entourage voient un signe de faiblesse dans cette sollicitude à l'égard de la classe inférieure, une faiblesse qui aurait pu enhardir la populace et l'inciter à la rébellion. »
languages.original_text: "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

traits.locale_text: « Comment ? Allons, {name}, ne me dites pas que vous croyez les affabulations de ces misérables paysans... Je ne demande à personne de payer les taxes en êtres humains, je me contente d'alléger le fardeau des villages qui ont pâti de l'échec des expériences sur la nourriture enrichie. En clair, je rassemble les sujets les plus touchés, ceux qui ne sont plus capables de travailler, pour les étudier davantage. Certains dans mon entourage voient un signe de faiblesse dans cette sollicitude à l'égard de la classe inférieure, une faiblesse qui aurait pu enhardir la populace et l'inciter à la rébellion. »

languages.text: "Ne? {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}, sefil köylülerin iddialarına sahiden inanıyor olamazsınız. Kimseden aşarını insanla ödemesini istemedim. Zenginleştirilmiş gıdalarla yapılan başarısız deneyler sonucunda zarar gören yerleşimlerin yükünü azaltma maksadıyla, süreçten en kötü etkilenen denekleri, yani artık çalışamayacakları tetkikte bulunmak üzere topluyorum. Çevremde alt tabakayı böylesine önemsememi zayıflık olarak nitelendirenler yok değil. Hatta bu, yürek yemiş ayaktakımının isyan bayrağı çekmesinin sebebi olabilirmiş."
languages.original_text: "What? Really, {name}, you speak as if you actually believe the claims of those wretched peasants... I do not ask anyone to pay the tithes in human bodies. I am reducing the burden on the settlements which have suffered as a result of unsuccessful experiments involving enriched food, and I'm gathering the worst-affected subjects, those who are no longer capable of work, for further study. Some among my circle would call such concern for the underclass a weakness. A weakness which may have incited rebellion among the emboldened rabble."

traits.locale_text: "Ne? Sefil köylülerin iddialarına gerçekten inanıyor olamazsınız. Aşar olarak adam topladığım falan yok. Takviyeli gıdalarla yapılan başarısız deneyler sonucunda zarar gören yerleşimlerin yükünü azaltmak amacıyla, deneyden en kötü etkilenen denekleri, yani artık çalışamayacakları tetkikte bulunmak üzere topluyorum. Çevremde, alt tabakayı böylesine önemsememi bir zayıflık olarak nitelendirenler yok değil. Hatta bu, yürek yemiş ayaktakımının isyan bayrağı çekmesinin sebebi olabilirmiş.
